result.eng: I love being outside in the open air.
result.ga: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.

result.eng: This house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ga: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.orig: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.html: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teaċ seo á úsáid mar ṫeaċ cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.

result.eng: I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI love being out in the open air.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ga: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.orig: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.html: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ponchtml: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrṫa gaċ bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: A large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.
result.ga: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann
result.orig: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann
result.html: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu annA large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon mór teangaċa in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu annA large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: Ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.orig: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.html: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: The spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ga: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.orig: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.html: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na spiairí á ḃfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.html: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.

result.eng: I've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ga: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.orig: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.html: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamhI've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċuala mé gadaíoċt curṫa síos dó riaṁI've never heard him being accused of stealing.
